mapper.update: UPDATE `cms_bt_jm_promotion` AS a SET `brand`=( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT IFNULL(c.brand_name,'')) FROM cms_bt_jm_promotion_product AS b JOIN `cms_bt_jm_product` AS c ON c.`channel_id`=b.`channel_id` AND c.`product_code`=b.`product_code` WHERE b.`cms_bt_jm_promotion_id`=a.`id` ) WHERE a.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t2.promotion_id FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, DATE_ADD( activity_end, INTERVAL - 8 HOUR ) AS beijing FROM cms_bt_jm_promotion ) a WHERE NOW() > a.beijing ) t1, cms_bt_promotion t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.promotion_id AND t2.promotion_status = 1
SELECT t2.id FROM ( SELECT *, DATE_ADD( signup_deadline, INTERVAL - 8 HOUR ) AS beijing FROM cms_bt_jm_promotion ) t2 WHERE t2.beijing > now()

SELECT t2.channel_id, t1.product_code, t2.jm_sku_no, t2.sku_code, t2.sale_price, t1.market_price, t1.deal_price FROM ( SELECT * FROM cms_bt_jm_promotion_sku t3 WHERE t3.cms_bt_jm_promotion_id = #{jmPromotionId} ) t1, cms_bt_jm_sku t2 WHERE t1.channel_id = t2.channel_id AND t1.sku_code = t2.sku_code
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_bt_promotion set promotion_status = 0, modifier=#{modifier},modified =now() where promotion_id = #{jmPromotionId};

update cms_bt_jm_promotion as a INNER JOIN ( select cms_bt_jm_promotion_id, count(product_code) as cnt, sum(quantity) as quantity_sum from cms_bt_jm_promotion_product where quantity > 0 group by cms_bt_jm_promotion_id ) c on c.cms_bt_jm_promotion_id = a.id and a.id in ( SELECT prom.promotion_id FROM cms_bt_promotion as prom where prom.promotion_status = 1 and prom.active = 1 and prom.channel_id = #{channelId} and prom.cart_id = #{cartId} and prom.activity_end >= now()) set a.prod_sum = c.cnt, a.quantity_sum = c.quantity_sum
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id FROM `cms_bt_jm_promotion` t1 join cms_bt_promotion t2 on (NOW() <= t1.activity_start and t1.activity_start <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)) and t1.id = t2.promotion_id and t2.promotion_status = 1 and t2.active = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_bt_jm_promotion set ${stepName} = ${stepStatus}, modifier = #{modifier} ,modified = now() where id = #{jmPromotionId}
